outline:
1. to retreat, flee, depart, move, wander abroad, stray, flutter
    1. (Qal)
      1. to retreat, flee
      2. to flee, depart
      3. to wander, stray
      4. to flutter (of birds)
    2. (Poal) to flee away, be chased
    3. (Hiphil) to chase away
    4. (Hophal) to be chased away
    5. (Hithpolel) to flee away
kjv_def: chase (away), [idiom] could not, depart, flee ([idiom] apace, away), (re-) move, thrust away, wander (abroad, -er, -ing).
strongs_def: properly, to wave to and fro (rarely to flap up and down); figuratively, to rove, flee, or (causatively) to drive away
